hero.heading: Hi, I'm Sergei!
hero.paragraphBold: A web developer currently based in Vladivostok.
hero.paragraph: Though I'm still a studen, it doesn't stop me from realizing my dreams of being a professional web developer.

about.heading: Where it all starts
about.paragraph: Loving playing with lego since childhood once I found out about web developing and understood that it's not just but much more than creating something from different shapes. That's how love for teamwork and helping people achieve their goals came just from childhood hobby.
